name: Untitled.apl
description:
After 230 days of starting development on the first game the second game comes out after nearly 6 months of hard work. Play this game and experience the year of 3258 after a nuclear blast affects your servants and makes them turn crazy. Fend off these deformed monsters while trying to avoid the worst monster of all, not a mutation, but a demon summoned from the depths of hell.

Instructions are IMPORTANT and are in game exept this one...

On hell mode. you cannot hear any monsters, go upstairs and watch the demon... if they raise their hand it means something (anything) has arrived, left arm means it was upstairs, and right arm means downstairs. Collect coins and throw them at the demon to kill them.
